name: CRYPTIC (itch) (ayouub)
description:
Welcome to the Crypt

John, an urbex enthusiast, is used to going exploring alone, without warning anyone. One night, under a full moon, he decided to go check out a small crypt not far from his home. What was a usual walk for him soon turned into a nightmare. No sooner had he set foot in the catacombs than the floor collapsed. After a fall of several meters, John woke up in a library with no way to turn back. John was excited to explore an unknown crypt, but the heavy atmosphere of the crypt did not bode well for the future.

                      Devices :
  •  mouse and keyboards
Controls :
  • Move : ZQSD
  • Interact : E
  • Turn on/off the light : Left click
  • Intensify the light : Right click
  • Reload the light : Mouse scroll wheel Up
 Details :
  • A terrifying Monster
  • Creepy atmosphere
  • Puzzles
  • Exploration
  • and....FEAR
Credits :

Designed by :, Ayoub OUAHID,Stéphane Murça

Developped by  : Julien Aberton, Maxime BRITTO, 

Art direction and Design by : Malik Boukhelif, Matthieu Cadet 

This game is developed on Unreal Engine 4.
